list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short metal pin or bolt for holding together two plates of metal, its headless end being beaten out or pressed down when in place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a rectangular plate containing an iron rivet
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một tấm hình chữ nhật có chứa một đinh tán sắt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: join or fasten (plates of metal) with a rivet or rivets.
hold (someone or something) fast so as to make them incapable of movement.
